org.araneaframework.http.core
Class FileDownloadActionListener

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.core.StandardActionListener
      org.araneaframework.http.core.FileDownloadActionListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ActionListener
public class FileDownloadActionListener
extends StandardActionListener

An action listener for downloading files with AJAX. Register this listener in your widget, and provide a callback or some data to it. In JSP, write a script like this: return Aranea.Page.downloadFile('download','${widgetId}','${rowRequestId}');. The FileDownloadActionListener.FileDownloadHandler is the callback used to retrieve file data to upload it to the client once file upload is requested.

Since:
1.2.3
Author:
Martti Tamm (martti@araneaframework.org)
See Also:

Method Detail

processAction

public void processAction(String actionId,
                          String actionParam,
                          InputData input,
                          OutputData output)
                   throws Exception
Description copied from class: StandardActionListener
Action processing method that includes an action parameter. Implementation should be able to handle different actionIds.

Specified by:
processAction in class StandardActionListener
Parameters:
actionId - The ID of the incoming action.
actionParam - The parameter for the action (from request under name ApplicationService.ACTION_PARAMETER_KEY)
input - The request data.
output - The response data.
Throws:
Exception - Any runtime exception that might occur.
